translations: 超音速燃烧冲压喷气发动机

sentences.sentence: Scramjets engines can not start until the plane flies faster than the speed of sound.
sentences.translation: 超高速冲压喷气发动机引擎在飞机超过音速的情况下不能启动。

sentences.sentence: But Joe Vogel, the project manager at Boeing, says the technology has “crossed over the threshold” into hypersonic flight. He reckons that scramjets might one day power civilian aircraft.
sentences.translation: 但是波音公司项目经理乔•沃格尔说，超音速飞机在技术上已经取得了重大突破，他预计超然冲压发动机将来也可能会应用到民航客机上。
